li.label: Titan’s Grip
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} grips their weapon with the unyielding strength of a mountain, striking with immense power. {PAWN_pronoun}’s attacks crush through defenses as if they were made of sand, leaving only rubble in their wake.

li.label: Immovable Stride
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves with the steady, powerful steps of the earth itself. {PAWN_pronoun}’s stride is firm and unwavering, leaving no ground unclaimed. {PAWN_pronoun} charges forward, unstoppable like an avalanche.

li.label: Mountain’s Bond
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} shares a deep connection with the earth, drawing strength from the mountains and the rock beneath. {PAWN_pronoun} bends nature to {PAWN_possessive} will, commanding the creatures of the land with the power of stone.

li.label: Unshakable Will
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is as unmovable as the foundations of the earth. {PAWN_pronoun} resists all attempts to disrupt their focus, standing firm against pain and fatigue like a mountain that never falters.

li.label: Unyielding Stance
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} stands like an immovable stone, immune to the filth and toxins that might harm others. No matter the conditions, {PAWN_pronoun} remains standing, solid and unaffected by the harshest of environments.

li.label: Rock-Hewn Recipes
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} crafts meals with the enduring strength of the earth itself. {PAWN_pronoun} ensures that every ingredient is used efficiently, sustaining the troops like the heart of a mountain that never runs dry.

li.label: Colossal Presence
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} carries the weight of mountains in their presence. {PAWN_pronoun} exudes power and determination, inspiring those around {PAWN_pronoun} to stand firm and follow with unwavering loyalty.

li.label: Unshakable Aid
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} helps others with the steady and firm touch of the earth. {PAWN_pronoun} heals and comforts others with unwavering patience, never letting the wounded suffer for long.

li.label: Earthen Growth
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} taps into the power of the earth to promote growth. {PAWN_pronoun} can nurture the land with an almost mystical touch, ensuring that crops grow and yield plentiful harvests, like a mountain rich with resources.
